name: UNOS_CLIN_INFO_4
description: Additional information reported to the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for each of the registry records or forms.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: C_PEPTIDE
columns.description: The patient's most recent C-peptide lab value

columns.name: C_PEPTIDE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The status item for the C-peptide result

columns.name: HBA1C
columns.description: The patient's HbA1c

columns.name: HBA1C_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The HbA1c status for the patient

columns.name: PAT_ON_INSULIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the patient is on insulin

columns.name: INSULIN_RES_DT_C_NAME
columns.description: The status for the insulin resumed date

columns.name: INSULIN_DOSE
columns.description: The patient's insulin dosage

columns.name: INSULIN_DOSE_DT_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The insulin dosage status

columns.name: BLOOD_SUGAR_CTL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient is using blood sugar control

columns.name: ORAL_BLD_SGR_MED_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on oral medications for blood sugar control

columns.name: ORAL_MED_RSM_DT
columns.description: The date the patient resumed oral medication for blood sugar control

columns.name: ORAL_MED_RSM_DT_S_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no blood sugar resumed date

columns.name: ON_DIABETIC_DIET_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on a diabetic diet

columns.name: INSULIN_DUR
columns.description: The insulin duration

columns.name: INSULIN_DUR_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The insulin duration status

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_DATE
columns.description: The date of the transplant patient's first set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_DATE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (1): Date test performed field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FEV1
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEV1 in L for the first set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FEV1_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (1): FEV1 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FVC
columns.description: The transplant patient's FVC in L for the first set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FVC_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (1): FVC field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FEF2575
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEF 25-75 in L/sec for the first set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT1_FEF_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (1): FEF 25-75 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_DATE
columns.description: The date of the transplant patient's second set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_DATE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (2): Date test performed field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FEV1
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEV1 in L for the second set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FEV1_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (2): FEV1 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FVC
columns.description: The transplant patient's FVC in L for the second set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FVC_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (2): FVC field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FEF2575
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEF 25-75 in L/sec for the second set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT2_FEF_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (2): FEF 25-75 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_DATE
columns.description: The date of the transplant patient's third set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_DATE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (3): Date test performed field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FEV1
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEV1 in L for the third set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FEV1_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (3): FEV1 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FVC
columns.description: The transplant patient's FVC in L for the third set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FVC_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (3): FVC field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FEF2575
columns.description: The transplant patient's FEF 25-75 in L/sec for the third set of pulmonary function tests during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_PFT3_FEF_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Pulmonary Function Test (3): FEF 25-75 field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_SUPPO2_YN
columns.description: Whether the transplant patient required supplemental oxygen during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_REST
columns.description: The transplant patient's percentage of inspired oxygen required at rest during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_REST_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the FiO2 at rest field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_O2FLOW_REST
columns.description: The transplant patient's oxygen flow required at rest in L/min during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_O2FLOW_REST_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Flow at rest field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_EXERCISE
columns.description: The transplant patient's percentage of inspired oxygen required with exercise during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_EXERCISE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the FiO2 with exercise field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_O2FLOW_EXERCISE
columns.description: The transplant patient's oxygen flow required with exercise in L/min during the follow-up period.

columns.name: UNOS_O2FLOW_EXERCISE_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the Flow with exercise field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_EPSD_VT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had ventilatory support.

columns.name: UNOS_EPSD_VT_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description: The timeframe of the transplant patientï¿½s ventilatory support.

columns.name: UNOS_TRACH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had a tracheostomy.

columns.name: UNOS_HR_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: The heart procedure used for the transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_HRHL_ISCH
columns.description: The heart total ischemia time in minutes.

columns.name: UNOS_HRHL_ISCH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason why the heart total ischemia time field is empty.

columns.name: UNOS_LLU_ISCH
columns.description: The left lung total ischemia time in minutes. Submitted to UNOS for field name lu_isch.

columns.name: UNOS_LLU_ISCH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason why the left lung total ischemia time field is empty. Submitted to UNOS for field name lu_isch_i.

columns.name: UNOS_RLU_ISCH
columns.description: The right lung total ischemia time in minutes. Submitted to UNOS for field name lu2_isch.

columns.name: UNOS_RLU_ISCH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason why the right lung total ischemia time field is empty. Submitted to UNOS for field name lu2_isch_i.

columns.name: UNOS_PST_STROKE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had a stroke post-transplant but prior to discharge.

columns.name: UNOS_PST_DIALYSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had dialysis post-transplant but prior to discharge.

columns.name: UNOS_PST_VENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had ventilator support post-transplant but prior to discharge.
entries: Ventilator support for > 48 hours but < 5 days

columns.name: UNOS_PST_REINTUB_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient was reintubated post-transplant but prior to discharge.

columns.name: UNOS_PST_AIR_DEHI_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient had airway dehiscence post-transplant but prior to discharge.

columns.name: UNOS_PRE_A_TITER_C_NAME
columns.description: The transplant patient's most recent pre-transplant anti-A titer. This field only applies if the recipient's ABO blood type is B or O.

columns.name: UNOS_PRE_TITER_A_DT
columns.description: The date of the transplant patient's most recent pre-transplant anti-A titer.

columns.name: UNOS_PRE_B_TITER_C_NAME
columns.description: The transplant patient's most recent pre-transplant anti-B titer. This field only applies if the recipient's ABO blood type is A or O.

columns.name: UNOS_PRE_TITER_B_DT
columns.description: The date of the transplant patient's most recent pre-transplant anti-B titer.

columns.name: UNOS_CARDIAC_INDEX
columns.description: The transplant patient's most recent cardiac index in L/min/m^2 during the reporting period.

columns.name: UNOS_INTUB_72HR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient was intubated at 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_PAO2_72HR
columns.description: The transplant patient's PaO2 in mm/Hg at 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_72HR
columns.description: The transplant patient's percentage of inspired oxygen required at 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_EMCO_72HR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether extracorporeal membrane oxygenation was used on the transplant patient at 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_NO_72HR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient inhaled nitric oxide at 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_PAO2_72HR_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the PaO2 at 72 hours field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_FIO2_72HR_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the FiO2 at 72 hours field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_LU_PERFUSED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant organs were perfused prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_PERFSN_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The location at which the transplant organs were perfused prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_PERFSN_PERF_C_NAME
columns.description: Who performed the perfusion on the transplant organs prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_TIME_ON_PERFSN
columns.description: The total time in minutes the transplant organs were on perfusion prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_TIME_PERF_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason why the total time on perfusion field is blank.

columns.name: UNOS_LLU_RCD_C_NAME
columns.description: How the left lung was received at the transplant center.

columns.name: UNOS_RLU_RCD_C_NAME
columns.description: How the right lung was received at the transplant center.

columns.name: SURG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgeon who last saw the transplant patient.

columns.name: SURG_NPI
columns.description: The National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the surgeon who last saw the transplant patient.

columns.name: UNOS_STEROID_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient has a chronic steroid prescription.

columns.name: UNOS_TRNSFSNS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transplant patient has undergone transfusions between listing and transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_HL_PROC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The heart or lung procedure type used for the transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_PA_PRIM_DX_C_NAME
columns.description: UNOS pancreas primary diagnosis
entries: Pulmonary AV Malformation Congenital Heart Disease
COVID-19: Dilated Myopathy: History of Myocarditis
Congenital Heart Defect - Prior Surgery Unknown
Congenital Heart Defect - Hypoplastic Left Heart Syndrome - Unoperated
Diabetes - Type I Insulin Dep/Juv Onset
Diabetes - Type I Non-Insulin Dep/Juv On
Diabetes - Type II Insulin Dep/Adult Ons
AHN: Other, Specify (e.g., Acute Viral Infection, Autoimmune Hepatitis - Fulminant)
Cirrhosis: Chronic Active Hepatitis: Etiology Unknown
Cirrhosis: Other, Specify (e.g., Histiocytosis, Sarcoidosis, Granulomatous)
Acute Alcohol-Associated Hepatitis With or Without Cirrhosis
Alcohol-Associated Cirrhosis Without Acute Alcohol-Associated Hepatitis
Biliary Hypoplasia: Nonsyndromic Paucity of Intrahepatic Bile Duct
Biliary Hypoplasia: Alagille's Syndrome (Paucity of Intrahepatic Bile Duct)
Biliary Atresia or Hypoplasia: Other, Specify
Metdis: Wilson's Disease, Other Copper Metabolism Disorder
Metdis: Glyc Stor Dis Type I (GSD-I)
Metdis: Glyc Stor Dis Type IV (GSD-IV)
PLM: Other, Specify (i.e., Klatzkin Tumor, Leiomysarcoma)
Bile Duct Cancer: (Cholangioma, Biliary Tract Carcinoma)
Graft vs. Host Dis Sec to Non-Liver Txp
Diabetes Secondary to Chronic Pancreatitis without Pancreatectomy
Diabetes Secondary to Cystic Fibrosis without Pancreatectomy

columns.name: UNOS_PA_PRIM_DX_SP
columns.description: UNOS pancreas primary diagnosis, specify

columns.name: UNOS_PA_GR_PLCMNT_C
columns.description: UNOS pancreas graft placement

columns.name: UNOS_PA_OP_TECH_C
columns.description: UNOS pancreas operative technique

columns.name: UNOS_PA_DUCT_MGMT_C
columns.description: UNOS pancreas duct management

columns.name: UNOS_PA_DUCT_MGM_SP
columns.description: UNOS pancreas duct management, specify

columns.name: UNOS_PA_VNS_MGMT_C
columns.description: UNOS pancreas venous vascular management

columns.name: UNOS_PA_ART_RCN_C
columns.description: UNOS pancreas arterial reconstruction
entries: Insertion of a donor iliac artery graft
Supraceliac aortic anastomosis to portion of donor thoracic aorta

columns.name: UNOS_PA_ART_RCN_SP
columns.description: UNOS pancreas arterial reconstruction, specify

columns.name: UNOS_PA_VNS_EXT_YN
columns.description: UNOS pancreas venous extension graft

columns.name: UNOS_PA_TOT_PRES
columns.description: UNOS pancreas total preservation time (hours)

columns.name: UNOS_PA_TOT_PR_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: UNOS pancreas total preservation time status

columns.name: UNOS_PA_HYP_REJ_C_NAME
columns.description: UNOS pancreas contributory cause of graft failure: hyperacute rejection

columns.name: UNOS_WT_POST_TX
columns.description: The patient's post-transplant weight

columns.name: UNOS_WT_POST_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's post-transplant weight status

columns.name: UNOS_INSLN_POST_TX
columns.description: UNOS average total insulin dosage per day post-transplant

columns.name: UNOS_INS_PST_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: UNOS average total insulin dosage per day post-transplant status
